website_summaries.verdict: Beach house and scene reveals fun secret areas, and comes with 2 dolls.
pros: Parents love the backpack style of this playset, since it makes the whole thing easy to bring along
The beach setting includes lots of details, like a sliding house door and opening ice chest
The set includes a boat that fits both dolls plus beach and food accessories
cons: Pieces can detach, making it hard to close

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: The Polly pocket dolls are now made of some sort of silicone/plastic blend which makes them flexible but easily ripped. My 5 year old was disappointed that a foot ripped off after she put her into the submarine. Also the plastic joints that hold the two parts of the play beach house together are cheap the even after day one would not be tight enough to stay upright and would fall over. Save your money and buy something else. Purchased for a long flight but was a total bust.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Small/staircase falls off
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected. Staircase keeps falling off. But other then that its great! So happy polly pockets are making a come back!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to share Polly Pocket with my granddaughter, I purchased this one for her and it did not even make it one day before the doll broke and would not stand up on the stickers. The case will not stay closed. This turned into a disappointing gift. They need to make toys like they use to.
customer_reviews.author: Lanorah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Won't close unless you have everything in there " just so ". The thing that you turn to make a doll dance doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Cute but should come together with pins in
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter really liked this, because she likes tiny dolls, I was not happy with the fact that the pins that hold the 2 pieces together to make it close came in a seperate bag that got lost in all the Christmas wrapping paper. It should come already together with the pins in so there's not a chance of losing the pins considering it's a toy for children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this one in the mail last night. My 8 year old daughter has been collecting these since she was very small, she has most of them. This one did not disappoint, and the fact that it looks like a little backpack suitcase is adorable. Honestly, even as an adult I still love these toys. The only thing I would change is the dolls, i always feel like their feet are gonna come off. But it's not happened yet, not with any of her playsets so I can't deduct stars for it. The sets are very well thought out, they're worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Assemble correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this item as it was a gift for our 6 year old. It is her first Polly pocket item and I wanted her to love it as much as I did as a child. The problem is there is a definitive issue with the assembly. It can be played with in two pieces but clicking them together so it stays up right (like a clam shell like all Polly pockets are suppose to be played like) is impossible. It does not snap together and it is so heavy (the top) it does not stay up. So save yourself the frustration of this Polly pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute with lots of details
customer_reviews.text: It’s probably not recommended for children under three but my two year old loves this so much! The dolls are a little weird. They have bendy silicone legs but seem durable. My daughter has spent many hours already playing with this set. It’s great to bring out to dinner with you so they can play while you wait to be served.
customer_reviews.author: bobalego

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, easily breakable and the jelly polly pocket is too small. Need to go back to the hard plastic character Polly to make her not easily rippable.
customer_reviews.author: @visidream

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: She wasn't expecting this being a "set" as much as simple figures. Of course it's small (and the box it comes in is huge, more than doubles the size of the set - what a waste). The figures stick to every sticker that's in the set, and it comes with some more stickers that you can paste elsewhere, so she also loved that. The detail in the set is very nice. Excellent product for the price, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. López

customer_reviews.title: Cute. But very Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure my daughter will like it, but this product is very cheaply made. The clasps don't always stick so it opens up or falls apart sometimes, the dolls don't always stay put, and the whole thing just seems cheap. My Polly pockets as a kid were amazing and still are! This will not last...I'm confident about that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Half toy missing.  Amazon worker was not paying attention to repackage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought via Amazon warehouse. Was "inspected" and all there in the description. Half of it is missing. Birthday girl is sad. Have to return for refund. Check more carefully next time!
customer_reviews.author: P. Li.

customer_reviews.title: niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a 5 year old niece. Love that it all compacts into the box and that the dolls don't have those annoying stretchy clothes that rip. Not a lot of pieces so there is less to loose although the items/dolls themselves are very tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift but not mobile
customer_reviews.text: My daughter does like playing with it but the ladder comes off a lot and I have to reattach it and it will not shut and stay locked when shut. It keeps popping open like the connector to shut it isn’t long enough
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee M.

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting it to come in two different parts. When it arrives you have to put the thing together and if you put the plastic pins in wrong it is next to impossible to get back out. Other than that I would give it a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: TheClark's

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My niece didn’t even get a chance to play with this because it arrived damaged. The box is torn and dirty. I’m very disappointed and now have to not only deal with going to ups to return this item, but also have to go out and purchase another since it’s needed tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love Polly for the new generation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friends daughter. We all had Polly pocket as kids so this brought back so many memories! The kids loved it just as much as the nostalgic adults. Definitely for kids 4 and up because of the small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service but quality issue with the toy
customer_reviews.text: First, the unit came within quoted lead time and was as described. We love Polly pocket however this one unit would not close so we needed to return it. The return went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter, age 4, likes to play with this, but the pieces are small and they seems to find their way to the floor. However, she's thrilled with it, loves to move things around...so, yes, I'd buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves polly pocket ever since she found an original at my mom's house. She said the original polly pockets are better, but these are still lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rice

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Polly is her favorite thing and this is one of her favorite tiny worlds for her little dolls. Great buy! Came with extra Polly Stick sheets so Polly can stand up anywhere on the compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amyd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as if it looked like it was a return from the store. The toy was not secured in it original box. There is 2 pins that hold the toy in place when it folds and those fall out, my 4 yr can’t carry it around bc it just comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy. The box came squished and it is a gift for Christmas. Also the actual toy looks terrible and like a cheap knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Letha arthur

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: My three your old has the same affinity for these toys as I did. Looks just like the picture. Wish the bed had only one sliding door instead of two. It can be kind of difficult to get the doll out
customer_reviews.author: Diana N.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So. Stinking. Cute! Takes you back to your childhood! My dau loves this polly pocket. So many things move and open. There is a little sticker sheet to decorate the case. Both dolls are very bendy but arent that sticky sort of plastic. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn’t there
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was so excited to have my girls play with a toy that I loved as a kid. Unfortunately the quality isn’t good and the toy won’t even close correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: The Return of Polly Pocket!
customer_reviews.text: When my 3 daughters were young they loved collecting all things Polly Pocket! I was excited to re-discover Polly for my grand-daughters and know they will enjoy playing with these cute sets as much as their mommies did many years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sharynlj

customer_reviews.title: The little girls love it
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect gift for the little girl. after getting 3-4 of them and combining them together, you create a tiny world and lets the kids imagination run free.
customer_reviews.author: Ya Tee Vang

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these larger Polly Pocket worlds. This kept her so occupied that we were able to eat at the Majestic Yosemite Hotel without hearing her complain once! It was amazing. These are so great to bring for play on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Elara

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact, easy for travel
customer_reviews.text: Niece enjoyed this gift. Magnetic stickers to attach people a plus. Small and compact, easy for travel
customer_reviews.author: East 4

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: My 7-yr old granddaughter really loves this beach back pak. Her only complaint is not being able to open both doors to the bedroom suite a the same time. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Skycolors

customer_reviews.title: One of my childhood dream toy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a Polly Pocket when i was a kid, but since i’m already almost past the calendar, i got one for my 7 year old niece and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: KARENNP

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this but the biggest complaint is that it doesn't want to stay closed so transporting it makes it a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nieces loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for niece (5 yr) and she loved it. Her older sister loved it also (7 yr) as she was playing with it when birthday girl wasn’t. Cute and very portable!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toy! My niece loves Polly Pocket! She was super excited to get this and had to open it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Disneymama2019

customer_reviews.title: Polly Pockets was a hit for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my granddaughter. She loved it, and out of all her presents, played exclusively with this all day!
customer_reviews.author: JennyB

customer_reviews.title: Biased original Polly Pocket Owner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted the Polly Pockets like I had as a child. These new ones are cheaply constructed, but if your kid hasn’t played with the originals they wouldn’t know the difference. My daughter noticed the quality difference right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute stepping up gift
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it’s self contained and the boat can float in water.
customer_reviews.author: M. Del Vecchio

customer_reviews.title: Cute Polly Pocket
customer_reviews.text: A revamp of the old Polly Pockets. My 7 year old loves it and you can play with it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: April Kandil

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 and 5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: They love playing with them in the car and at restaurants
customer_reviews.author: Ty Smalls Hillesheim

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and brings back childhood memories for me.. it doesn't hold attention for that long
customer_reviews.author: trisha willett

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pieces don't use with smaller children around
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter calls these her friends and is going to be a static that I found the one that she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Once opened the box will not close again. My daughter said "it's awful".
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bones

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Polly Pocket Stuff my Granddaughter has.
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my Granddaughter with this for her 7th birthday. She was thrilled. Her and her sister received lot of the Polly Pocket merchandise for Christmas and this was an added plus. Hours of wonderful playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wright

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this as a gift and it is exactly what she thought it would be! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Traynor

customer_reviews.title: An engaging product
customer_reviews.text: My great nieces loved the polly pockets kits b/c they were familiar with them and didn't have these particular play kits. They love to act out make believe stories with the little houses, dolls and accessories...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made Incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to gift this Polly Pocket to my seven year old. Sadly, it didn't have the correct accessories so the notches on the beach are completely useless (as are the random pieces it came with). Additionally, the large boat doesn't fit inside the unit.
customer_reviews.author: JR Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Paid full price, for half of toy
customer_reviews.text: Came sealed. No joke, half was missing. Half of the lid was not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Not Available

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed getting this. She really loves the way the dolls stick to different places
customer_reviews.author: M. Ossler

customer_reviews.title: Parts do not stay together well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas but it is fairly difficult to play with, as the two halves will not stay together. It falls apart constantly. Luckily, she doesn't mind and just plays with them separately. I'm disappointed in the product though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Product box was SEVERELY damaged, however, shipping box was ok - meaning it was damaged before it was boxed up and shipped. Very unsatisfied. Only reason I didn’t give it a higher rating was because the box was damaged and it is a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this Polly pocket! Great gift for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra Span

customer_reviews.title: Box came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged. This was a Christmas gift, the child seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Dial

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Continuing the tradition of daughter to granddaughter with Polly Pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: The dolls heads are easily chewed off
customer_reviews.text: It had a connection piece missing so it was permanently in two pieces. Therefore it is junk...which all toys end up being anyway
customer_reviews.author: Tmarie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a six year old that was a big hit with her.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.  Hard to close.
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this set. However it is very difficult for them to line up everything just so in order for the backpack to close. This bus the only Polly pocket set we've had this issue with.
customer_reviews.author: David Heredia

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Horrible hard to open and close little pieces break off and make plastic edges dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Don't want to return it.. but do want the missing rods foe the hinge so it will open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sackal

customer_reviews.title: Used when I paid for new.
customer_reviews.text: The item had been opened and returned. The box was in terrible condition. I paid for a new item, it’s a gift, and now it’s on me to spend time to return it and not have a gift In time. Disappointed :-(
customer_reviews.author: lindsay schlueter

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The bracket that holds the two main pieces together, easily broke. Such a bummer, because other than that, my kids really enjoy playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love little things! All the accessories are so cute! Love how the people can stand now!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene allen

customer_reviews.title: Can never close it
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a boat and other peoces and can never figure out how to close the box
customer_reviews.author: kialey

customer_reviews.title: Polly Pocket
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered and delivered before expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: umcanes016

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love Polly Pockets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 5 year old. I like that it is self contained. She loves the beach and pool so this play toy with both should be fun for her.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of plastic. I would have given 1 star but my 7 yr old daughter really likes it...
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what we expected
customer_reviews.text: We did not get what we expected. The above picture and description do not match what we received in the mail (see my picture). Everything about it is great and my daughter ended up liking it. Just a heads up to future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Missing a Piece When Bought and Easy for Kids to Lose the Pieces That Come With It
customer_reviews.text: my little sister loved this product, but she would lose all the pieces quickly. We were also missing a piece that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Halliburton

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (and I too!) just love this Polly pocket set! It’s a great size and so many fun treasures/secrets to discover.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: damaged scratch
customer_reviews.text: I was greatly disappointed. This is because I received a product with scratches.
customer_reviews.author: dongyoonlee

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves them. Just like the old ones, with a more modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: I hate that my kid loves this so much.
customer_reviews.text: i gave this to one of my daughters for her birthday and now she and her sister won't stop playing with it. they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Photo not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The picture on Amazon is different than what was sent. Disappointing that product and picture do not match up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi H

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what we ordered.
customer_reviews.text: We didn't receive the Beach Vibes Polly Pocket, we instead received the Dance Party Polly Pocket. We were fortunate that the recipient liked it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew VonRuden

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely ridiculous!
customer_reviews.text: This is completely unexpectable! Im 100% dissatisfied and disappointed in my pakage!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Jade Flores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for little cousin
customer_reviews.text: She absolutely loved the polly pocket. She couldn't stop playing with it. Says it was the best gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: sabrina russell-holloman

customer_reviews.title: More parts missing than delivered.
customer_reviews.text: This item was not only missing the Polly pocket(s) and boat, but the entire bottom half of the Polly pocket unit!
customer_reviews.author: Darillyn

customer_reviews.title: USED!
customer_reviews.text: Why would I want to purchase a used Polly pocket? What a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hart

customer_reviews.title: As described in posting.
customer_reviews.text: Item was received as expected and as it was described in the posting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Toy arrived ripped and open. The shipping box was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived quickly! My niece loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica DeArment

customer_reviews.title: Was Cool Then AND Now!
customer_reviews.text: I loved Polly Pocket when I was young so I had to see if it would be a hit with my daughter, and sure enough it was! No assembly required which always makes life easier for parents. They're so much more interesting now than they were when I was young and have so many cool features and much attention to detail. Just make sure that no young young children get a hold of it as Polly pockets are very small and could absolutely be a choking hazard. But it's instant fun right out of the package!
customer_reviews.author: Tlake33111

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter who is fascinated with Polly Pocket
customer_reviews.author: Constance Wellik

product_meta.title: Polly Pocket Hidden Places Beach Vibes Backpack with Beach Theme, Dolls & Accessories
feature_bullets: Polly Pocket Hidden Places Beach Vibes Backpack opens to reveal a larger beach-themed Polly world
Great to take on-the-go for beachy keen play anytime, anywhere!
Comes with Polly and Shani dolls and opens to a beach house and sand-and-sun beach scene plus areas to hang out for the ultimate beach vibing!
Secret reveal areas include a submarine you can place Polly in; twirling tiki pole that lets Polly doll dance; pool and ice chest that open; and the beach house door slides
Hit the waves with the boat that is included and fits both dolls!
